# Extreme Networks ExtremeXOS EAPS Configuration
# Ethernet Automatic Protection Switching

configure snmp sysname "exos-eaps-switch"

# Create VLANs for EAPS
create vlan "EAPS_CTRL" tag 4000
create vlan "EAPS_DATA" tag 100
create vlan "EAPS_VOICE" tag 200

# Create EAPS Domain
create eaps ring1

# Configure EAPS Control VLAN
configure eaps ring1 add control vlan EAPS_CTRL

# Configure EAPS Protected VLANs
configure eaps ring1 add protected vlan EAPS_DATA
configure eaps ring1 add protected vlan EAPS_VOICE

# Configure EAPS Ports
configure eaps ring1 mode master
configure eaps ring1 primary port 1:49
configure eaps ring1 secondary port 1:50

# Configure EAPS Failtime
configure eaps ring1 failtime 2

# Enable EAPS
enable eaps
enable eaps ring1

# ELRP for Loop Prevention
enable elrp-client
configure elrp-client periodic vlan EAPS_DATA ports 1:1-1:24 interval 3
